summary: Political and personal intrigues surround a group of characters in Malaya, after the close of the Second World War.
cast: William Holden|Susannah York|Capucine|Tetsurô Tanba|Michael Goodliffe|Allan Cuthbertson|Sydney Tafler|Maurice Denham|Beulah Quo|Christopher Allen|Griffiths Alun|Kip Bahadun|Ibrahim Bin|Tony Cheng|Noel Chow|Hew Thian Choy|Yap Mook Fui|David Keith|R. William Koh|James Massong|Tony Price|Hugh Robinson|Seow|David Weinman|George Zakhariah
title: El séptimo amanecer
